heading: Bangkok Pattaya Phuket Krabi | DEAL From Kolkata

itinerary.day1Heading: Arrival in Phuket | Experience breathtaking sandy beach views surrounded by nodding palm trees
itinerary.day1Overview: Upon your arrival at Phuket Airport, one of our representatives will pick you up and transfer you to your designated hotel. Phuket offers incredible views of the ocean and sandy beaches surrounded by palm trees, making it a top beach holiday destination. Check-in at the hotel and freshen up. Spend the rest of the day at leisure and enjoy a peaceful overnight stay.

itinerary.day2Heading: Phi Phi Island Tour | Walk around the powdery white beaches and observe coral reefs
itinerary.day2Overview: After breakfast, embark on an exciting Phi Phi Island Tour by speedboat. Explore the stunning limestone cliffs rising out of the emerald green waters. Visit Phi Don and Phi Leh towns, as well as the famous Maya Bay. Enjoy walking on the powdery white beaches and observe the vibrant coral reefs while swimming and snorkeling in the turquoise waters. Return to Phuket for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day3Heading: Transfer to Krabi | Enjoy splendid beauty of Phi Phi Island
itinerary.day3Overview: Wake up early to enjoy the morning beauty of Phi Phi Island. Proceed to Krabi as per your tour package. Krabi is known for its relaxing atmosphere, transparent limestone cliffs, mangrove forests, and numerous offshore islands. Check into your hotel upon arrival and rest. Overnight stay in Krabi.

itinerary.day4Heading: Krabi | Enjoy Island tour of Krabi
itinerary.day4Overview: After breakfast, embark on a Four Island Tour of Krabi by speedboat. Admire the scenic rocky cliffs and shimmering blue sea. Visit Koh Poda, Chicken Island, Tup Island, and Phranang Cave Beach. Relax on the beaches, sunbathe, snorkel, and swim in the Andaman Sea. Return to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day5Heading: Krabi to Pattaya | Enjoy nightlife of Pattaya
itinerary.day5Overview: Check out from the hotel and transfer to Krabi Airport for a flight to Bangkok. From Bangkok, proceed to Pattaya. Check-in at the hotel and relax. Enjoy the vibrant nightlife of Pattaya. Overnight stay in Pattaya.

itinerary.day6Heading: Krabi to Koh Larn | Get ready to adore the Coral Island
itinerary.day6Overview: Embark on a speedboat to reach Koh Larn Coral Island. Enjoy the pristine beaches and azure ocean views surrounded by swaying palm trees. In the evening, experience the Alcazar Show, known for its splendid performances and entertainment. Overnight stay in Pattaya.

itinerary.day7Heading: Pattaya to Bangkok | Visit famous shopping and eat street of Bangkok
itinerary.day7Overview: Check out from the hotel and transfer to Bangkok. Check-in at the hotel and freshen up. Explore the famous shopping areas and street food of Bangkok at your leisure. Overnight stay in Bangkok.

itinerary.day8Heading: Bangkok | Head out for a Full Day Sightseeing Tour
itinerary.day8Overview: After breakfast, embark on a full-day sightseeing tour of Bangkok. Visit fascinating temples like Wat Pho and Wat Arun, and explore the architectural beauty of the city. Spend the evening as per your preference. Overnight stay in Bangkok.

itinerary.day9Overview: Check out from the hotel after a delicious breakfast. You will be transferred to Bangkok International Airport for your return flight home, carrying wonderful memories of your Bangkok Pattaya Phuket Krabi tour from Kolkata.

overView.heading: Thailand's Cultural Kaleidoscope: Ancient Wonders and Modern Marvels
overView.text: Embark on an unforgettable journey through Thailand, a captivating land where ancient wonders harmonize with modern marvels. Explore the rich tapestry of cultures, vibrant traditions, and breathtaking landscapes that paint a vivid picture of this enchanting kingdom's essence.

overView.heading: Bangkok's Urban Allure: Glittering Temples and Tuk-Tuk Adventures
overView.text: Discover the allure of Bangkok, Thailand's electrifying capital city. Immerse yourself in the glittering grandeur of its ornate temples, navigate the bustling streets on an exhilarating tuk-tuk ride, and experience the city's pulsating energy that blends ancient heritage with modern flair.

overView.heading: Island Escapes: Thailand's Tropical Paradise
overView.text: Indulge in the tranquility of Thailand's pristine islands and crystal-clear waters. Relax on sun-kissed beaches, snorkel or dive in vibrant coral reefs teeming with marine life, and unwind in luxurious island resorts that offer a true tropical paradise.

overView.heading: Cultural Festivities: Thailand's Vibrant Celebrations and Traditions
overView.text: Immerse yourself in the colorful festivities and sacred traditions of Thailand. From vibrant temple fairs to captivating dance performances, experience the country's rich cultural heritage and spiritual vibrancy that captivate the hearts of visitors.

overView.heading: Northern Charm: Chiang Mai's Ancient Temples and Hillside Tribes
overView.text: Explore the enchanting northern region of Thailand, where ancient temples and hillside tribal villages create a mesmerizing backdrop. Wander through Chiang Mai's historic old city, trek through lush jungles, and witness the unique traditions of ethnic minority communities.

overView.heading: Culinary Delights: Thai Flavors and Street Food Extravaganza
overView.text: Savor the tantalizing flavors of authentic Thai cuisine and indulge in the street food extravaganza. From aromatic curries and sizzling stir-fries to refreshing tropical fruits and delectable sweets, embark on a culinary journey that delights the senses and showcases Thailand's diverse culinary heritage.

overView.heading: Artisan Treasures: Thai Handicrafts and Silk Weaving
overView.text: Discover Thailand's artisan traditions through its handcrafted treasures and intricate silk weaving. Explore local markets, interact with skilled artisans, and admire the craftsmanship that reflects the country's rich cultural heritage and artistic soul.

overView.heading: Craft Your Thai Adventure
overView.text: Craft your own adventure in Thailand, where every moment is infused with magic and discovery. Whether you seek serene beaches, cultural immersion, or adrenaline-fueled escapades, this captivating kingdom invites you to embrace its beauty and create memories that last a lifetime.

visaPolicy: Thailand has also started granting 30-day visa-free entry for visitors from India and Taiwan from November 1.
The initiative will remain applicable till May 10, 2024.
